This individual is skulking through the grass, carrying a small book and a long quill, and he's occasionally leaping up over the grass line, landing, and then drawing something in the book.

lines.text: Does he see me?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're overhead.

lines.name: LAURA

lines.text: As soon as you come down and whisper, the tome slams shut. The figure stands up straight, slowly turns the eyes towards you, and you can see the dark and ruddy skin, the sun-touched nose and cheeks, a darker, more leathered texture to them, but the eyes are piercing ice blue as he looks back into yours. "Nothing."

lines.text: "Yes."

lines.text: "You see, if you're worried, it's not me you need to worry about. It's him." And points past your shoulder.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm not looking. I'm not falling for that! Nope! Can I insight check him and see?

lines.text: Make an insight check, yeah.

lines.text: I love this place.

lines.text: 16? He seems like a slippery person in general, though he is caught off guard and right now is in self-preservation mode. It's hard to gauge if he's telling the truth or not.

lines.name: LAURA

lines.text: There is nothing visible in the vicinity.

lines.name: LAURA

lines.text: "Please! This is really high!"

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (whimpers)

lines.text: Hello to everyone.

lines.text: Look at you!

lines.text: Dangling from her grasp.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Gentle, Grog. Gentle.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Let's have a conversation."

lines.text: Don't talk to him.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What is this?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What are you?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What are you?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I am but a simple wanderer and an individual who enjoys learning about things that "are new and different."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Squeeze him.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Don't squeeze him, Grog.

lines.text: What's your name?

lines.text: "Garmelie."

lines.text: What was it?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Garmelie."

lines.text: What are you reading?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: What are you reading?

lines.text: "Nothing! No reading!"

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh yeah, compare notes!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He tries to wiggle out of your grasp, but it does nothing. You're concrete around him.

lines.text: (giggles) "No!"

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to very gently put my hand on the book and take it.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: May I?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (whimpers) (laughter)

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: That's the best face ever.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Garmelie, I saw what you were drawing, and it was quite lovely. Don't you want to share?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What's the matter? Are you scared?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You might want to tell us what's going on before we figure it out for ourselves. This is your chance.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "There's really nothing going on. I was curious and taking notes."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I've been taking notes myself.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Cross-references are always good.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "You wouldn't understand."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You could help us.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Do we have that Hunk of-- not that that's going to help here.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: The Hunk of Quall? It's expired.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'll step forward and put my hand on his shoulder and say: Listen.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: By the way, he's being held up by Grog right now.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: On his toe, then. I'll say: Listen, little man. I'm little, too, and you have nothing to fear from us as long as you cooperate. I will cast Suggestion on him, and I will suggest that he fully cooperate with us and tell us all he knows.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What's the DC?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Well, I didn't use the hand cone, did I? So 18.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Is the book safe to open?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you, touching his leg and looking up at him, there's that shimmer of purplish energy in your eyes, and he gives you a look. "Right, no worries. No problems whatsoever. Whatever you need."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Can I go find his feather quill that he dropped?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You don't know about the quill. You know the book that he had.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Tell us. Can we open the book?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Do you want to try to open the book?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm asking, is it safe to open? For me?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Yes, it's quite safe."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: What's at the bookmark, may I ask? And I slowly start to open it at the bookmark.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "It's where I'm currently making notes."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Please be nudie pictures.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm gently opening it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What do you see?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: He's brilliant. He captured everything.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What's it a picture of?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: He's a little shithead!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Has he drawn us?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I turn it.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Don't kill him, Grog!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: There's nothing wrong with drawing a funny picture.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Art is subjective.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh man, he nailed you, Grog.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What other goliath has been tromping through this place?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Many! So many. That's one of them."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to start gently flipping through some of the pages.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There are drawings of the entire party, but with extremely exaggerated cartoonish parody features. For Pike, her head is extremely large.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Like Six Flags Magic Mountain caricature vibe?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, with a hint of Mad Magazine. It's essentially a book full of dickbutts. It's him drawing and vandalizing the image of a number of you guys. There's a picture of Vax and Keyleth that are both covered in poo and slapping it on their face. Written in Elvish, "I love this!" with a word bubble. It's essentially a kid entertaining himself with a bunch of stupid pictures.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: This is an awfully expensive book to be this shitty in.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Is this just your hobby? Your pastime? Or are you an actual records keeper for whatever town this is? Because both would be humorous.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "No. No record keeper."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going much earlier in the book to see what's there.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There's a bunch of elvish ladies with oversized floppy boobs smacking each other in the face. It's truly childish. But they're really well drawn and well shaded! There is a serious talent to the artwork. His skewed intent of imagery is fascinating.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm in the mood to hear this guy's life story. Get him a cup.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I love them. Honestly, I think you're quite talented.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Should we make camp here and invite him into the mansion?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: As long as he's secure, yeah.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What's the name of this little town here that we see?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They've been here for a little while, and they've "been a gracious source of subjects."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: And where do you live when Syngorn's not here?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I live wherever I please. I choose my place to rest."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Where do your clothes come from? Where do you live?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Do you have any family? Friends?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They're just a ways away."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: So you know this area quite well.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I know it well, yes."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: So you could potentially guide us?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "It's hard to guide when you're being crushed by a giant green-gray man thing."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'm just saying, is there anyone that would miss you if you're gone?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Grog!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Be nice to our guest.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We're in the Feywild.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I have a deal for you. We could offer you--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Dinner!

lines.text: Dinner! Delicious dinner. Chicken. Have you ever had chicken? It's so wonderful.

lines.text: "Chicken?"

lines.name: MARISHA

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: If you happen to lead us where we want to go.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We'll tell you in a little bit.

lines.text: Yeah. Crack out the door, homie.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: And to sweeten the offer, after you've had dinner with us and we send you on your way, perhaps we will consider giving you your book back. Perhaps.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I fly off, and I go grab the quill.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a perception check. That quill fell in the center of a tall grass field.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I didn't even make it into the square. It was pathetic. 27?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You spend the better part of the next 20 minutes realizing that there is no way you're finding this quill amongst the grass. This is the needle in a hay factory.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Can I pat him down for any weapons?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make an investigation check.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: He's got seven dicks.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Nine.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Best you can find throughout his body, the only thing that catches your attention is a now-crushed ocarina that he had on the inside of his pocket that did not survive the grasping of Grog.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We can fix it for him.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: We can make you a new one somewhere.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Give me the bits.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Garmelie, we have a very bad track record when we make friends. We have been burned badly a few times, and I want to make it clear that you will be watched while you're here. Come in, eat, enjoy yourself, but multiple people here are keeping an eye on you. Understand?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I understand. Look, if we are to strike an accord here, one of friendly trade of services, I "would greatly appreciate it's done without this very handsome, muscled-- "

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (sneezes) I sneeze right in his face.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You see it (drip) off his nose. "Without this man trying to smash my innards, please."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Grog, let him go.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Well, not go. Just put him down.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Grog, put him down and put your hand on his shoulder.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Are we making camp here? Should we get in the house?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Let's hold hands as we walk through the door.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'll cast the mansion. I'll sit down and sing: (singing) My house is very, very, very fine house! With chicken everywhere! Life used to be so fair, but now it's better because of me! (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Welcome back, everyone. A couple quick things I forgot to mention at the top, as I guess I can talk about it now. GenCon.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh shit, we can talk about that?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I'm talking about it. They have a Critical Role panel that they've announced in the thing they put out--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Press release?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I've just been notified that once we hit 25k subscribers, that goal, whenever we reach that, will be 25k and a talent show. I guess a lot of the hosts and people involved with this show and others have a lot of random weird-ass talents that they want to reveal on the internet, because what could possibly go wrong? So that's something to look forward to. And we'll have other things intermittently, giveaways and other goals, but that's the next big goal that's been put out there as far as I know, so I want to let you guys be aware of that.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: My talent includes taming otters. I wish.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Is it the otter taming finger?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, that's my other stupid talent. But I wanted an excuse to have an otter here.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Shocking otters.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We missed the sloth, so if anyone wants to bring out an otter, I'd be okay with that, too.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You didn't miss anything. It moved super fucking slow.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, it was magical.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Maybe a baby panther.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That's so random, but I'm into it.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I want one.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 22k and a red panda.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: 25k and a talent show, though, is real.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You're going to get an e-mail tomorrow being like: Matt.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Unofficial!

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I don't want any zoo animals.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I don't want any badly poached animals taken from their environment.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Badly poached?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I know, that was terrible.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I like a nicely poached animal.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There you go. Affectionately. All right, guys, so back in the game. As you guys find your way into the interior of Scanlan's magnificent mansion, the individual, the fey creature known as Garmelie, nervously walks along with you. What do you wish to do before an evening's rest is taken?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I stand at the door like a sentry.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Let's have some food. Let's put two guards on him.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I put 20 guards on him.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: 20 guards? That's a lot of guards.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Hello."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Can we have a carpet picnic?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Is there a carpet here?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah, there's carpet, but we have beds.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Just a picnic?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Because we're in the Feywild. It seems appropriate.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We're not in the Feywild. We're in the house.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: There's tables.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I just thought it would be fun.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I would have a picnic with you, darling.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Thank you! I sit down next to the satyr and I stare at him like this, a little bit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Hi."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What do we want to know from this little twerp?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I shocked him when I abducted him.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Do you shed?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "A little."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Do you grow a thicker coat during wintertime?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Winter-- seasons-- It's not really a thing here."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Do you grow horns?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "They grew."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That's awesome.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Would you care for any ale?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Yes, please."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: All right. I crack out the big-ass cask of ale.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I would like some of that, as well, Grog.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Pass it around.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (gulps)

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Well, all right, Tiny Toons. Nicely done.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can I pull Vax aside for a moment and ask: Do you want to go to Syngorn? We could avoid it.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Well, we know no one here except for this guy. We need to find you that bow. I don't relish the idea of dealing with our father, but it seems like our best bet.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Right. Of course. We should go see them.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Are you sure you want to, though?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Of course, why wouldn't I? Please. And I walk back to the group.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I give the satyr another drink.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He greedily drinks it down.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Can I pet your fur? Is it coarse?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Keyleth!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Keyleth, that's a bit forward.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You're so touchy today.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I understand.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "So. If we're here to talk and make this deal we're discussing, what is it you want from me?"

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Is he looking any more drunk?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: A slight slur.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can I have some more ale, as well, Grog? Keep it coming, all around.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, fine.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Honest opinion, what is the disposition of the people in that city over on the hill? You can be frank. We're not from around here. You can't offend us with your opinion of them.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "It's a busy place right now. We haven't seen the city of Syngorn in close to a hundred "years, at the very least, and they have an entire army building up right now. It's hustle and bustle."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: They have an army building up? Why is that?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Hell if I know. I just wandered through and used that distraction to acquire a few things and "make some fantastic notes."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Acquire what?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Things."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Do you steal, darling?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I don't steal. I borrow indefinitely."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You just pinch small things, though, like little gold trinkets. This is not really a talent of yours, is it?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Are we talking klepto stealing, or career?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I take things that look nice that I think I would want."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Where do you steal these things? Are you a pickpocket?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I am no simple street thief. I am a procurer of wayward items and objects that need a "better home."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I think you should know that this door that you walked through in this big house, if you steal anything, it shreds you into ribbons when you leave.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a deception check.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Fuck. Six.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Oh, I'm sure it does, big man."

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Well, it'll disappear if you take it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It certainly will.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Well, good to know."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Chicken in your belly goes, though.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Look, I'm not going to take anything from you. You've already proven far more of a match for "me than I had ever anticipated, and what was meant to be a simple, fun game of follow and-- follow "has turned into a much more complicated circumstance, so I'd like to get it over with as "soon as possible."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Are you not having fun? We want you to at least enjoy yourself.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "My quill is gone! You've threatened me and my life!"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I searched for it! Was it a special quill?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "It had sentimental value. I can get another."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm sorry.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "What do you want from me?"

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We want you to take us to this place, this mirk place.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: The Shademirk.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "You want to go to the Shademirk? Whatever for? Why would you go to the Shademirk?"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: There's a very scary tree there.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Yes. Why?"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What do you know about the Shademirk?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "To stay the hell out of it, certainly. Want to go to the Shademirk? Be my guest!"

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: A little more than that, friend. A little more.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Your glass is looking empty.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You must know something, or else you wouldn't stay out of it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "It's been a source of vileness and ichor here in the Feywild for hundreds of years. It's a "terrible, horrible cesspool of nothing. I'm so sorry, this is getting everywhere."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Don't worry, the servants will get it. It's terrible because of what dwells there, or because of the place itself?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Both! All of it!"

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What dwells there?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Creatures, things, trollish slime creatures."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Do you have drawings? Have you drawn things from there?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I sketched a thing or two."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Which page?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Flip, flip, flip.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You take a moment to scan through, and there are all sorts of creatures, all drawn stupidly, many with extra private parts coming out of shoulders and stuff. "Around page 163, 164." And you see, and there are creatures all throughout, but at that page in particular, you see a lanky, tall humanoid that is oozing black, thick, viscous tar. It's shaded in a way where it looks like it has that glaze that only thick, oil-like substances really give off. And it's dragging this absolutely unnecessarily large dong behind it about four feet. Every picture looks pretty good to a point, and then you're like, "aw, really?"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Garmelie, that creature. Is it very large?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "It's a little bigger than you."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh shit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Gestures and takes his drink back.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Does it have a name? What's this called?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I haven't gotten close enough to it."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: But you know how to get there.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I know how to get there, but it's not an easy, let alone safe, route."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Well, we'll protect you.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "So you're saying that as part of this agreement, I will be your guide to the outskirts "of the Shademirk? Because I am not going in there."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: If you want your book back.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Have you heard of a very large-- well, I don't know if it's large. A very scary tree there? Something poisoning the land?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "The land there is poisoned. I haven't gone in there myself. I'm sure there's many poison trees."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: How far from here would you say it is?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Day and a half, maybe? Duskward-seaward, maybe?"

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: He's been very helpful. Maybe he could just point us in the direction.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No, we're taking him. We're taking him as far as we can. We need guides who know the land.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "You seem to speak like you know thievery, yes?"

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: One of us is a member of a thieves' guild.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "There's a few things in that there dreary elvish city that I haven't the skills to procure, "but if you wouldn't mind maybe borrowing them for me in my stead, well, we've a done deal."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Borrowing them indefinitely.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: What are we discussing, exactly?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Quid pro quo?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "If you will."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I've got no problem stealing from any of those people.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yes, but the devil's in the details. What are we after? Tell me a little bit more.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "We make the agreement first."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Say again?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "We make the agreement first. Consider it a bit of trust!"

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Balls is what that is.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Let us add an addendum, then. If we are going to steal things from you, you will not only take us to the bog--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: But you'll take us to our final destination.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Nope, no. No Shademirk. I'm out. Sorry."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Or we could kill you here.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Are we killing people?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We could kill him.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Do I get to grab him again?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Remember, you have to be nice to things in the Feywild. This is what we've learned.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm a master negotiator.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: No.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What is he doing?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Who's getting whispered to? Percy? Percy goes blind again. Every five minutes.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: This is interesting. 17.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: A roll and a re-whisper.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: The Feywild. Slippery. Sneaky.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: This is crazy.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Interesting.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: He just said the C-word, the F-word, the G-word!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "If it's that important to you to go to this dark place, then keep the book, all right? I can "draw more."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I've got an idea. We broke your ocarina, correct?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Yes."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Why don't I try and fix the ocarina? We give him his book back, we take a couple things from those people and get on our way? We could just get on our way.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Not have him at all?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: No, let's make the deal and get this moving. This is a place where deals happen. Let's do it.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What if he asks us to steal somebody?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We're talking about a pantsless cartoonist in the middle of fairy land.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We agree to the deal, we present it, and then we're there.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: If we can't steal the things, then the deal is off.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "It's that simple. We both go our separate ways, and good luck finding the Shademirk on your own."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's kismet, in my opinion.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Well, I trust you, Percy, if you think it's smart.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Can I insight check Percy? Because he's acting a little strange.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Same.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can make an insight check, but he's not acting too far out of his normal place here.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, but I've done insight checks before because he's Percy.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Did you do it?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Yeah, but I didn't get anything.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I got a 15. Balls.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's hard to ride one way or the other, but it's a valid point. If worse comes to worst, and what he's asking for is beyond your grasp or something that you wish not to do, then the deal is off and you go your separate ways.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We're in the Feywild. We're going to make a deal with something. This is what the Feywild is.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: All right. Fine.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I turn to Vex. You like this idea? You want to do this?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I have no love for that city. I don't care.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I want to go there, too.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: The people we're stealing from better be meanies, though, and they better have deserved it at some point.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Ultimately, I would love to ask them to help us in our fight. They're cowardly and stupid for hiding, but we could use their help if they're making an army.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Possibly better equipped and better educated, sorry, than this one here.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Well, Garmelie also said they were strengthening up an army. Did they ever have a standing army before?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They did.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: They did? Of course they did. They're a city.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It wasn't a huge army, per se, but they had trained forces, and they had a means of defending their city.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We had a fight instructor when we were growing up.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: They've all got sticks up their asses. They're fucking elves.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I can't wait.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I like this one."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Are you going to fix his what-is-it-called?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Give me your ocarina. Let me see if I can get to work on it.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I can help Percy.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I will inspire Percy by singing. (singing) Go ahead, Percy, and fix his ocarina! Take your tinkering tools and fix his ocarina! You go, Percival, you can fix his ocarina!

lines.name: ALL
lines.text: Hey, ocarina!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Take your d10.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Can I help with a Mending spell?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You can help with a Mending spell.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Mending spell? Do you have the cantrip? Mending is a cantrip.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I thought she used it once before on something.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I thought I used it as a ritual spell before.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You fixed that little Sarenrae doll.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Right. So you have the spell, correct?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I thought I learned it. I don't know.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Oh jeez, here comes the internet.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Cantrips you have at all times.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Can I use it as a 1st-level spell?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What cantrips do you know?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Guidance, Druidcraft. I used Druidcraft before, for the wooden thing. Can I use Druidcraft to help this?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: How would you use Druidcraft?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What's it made out of? Is it made out of wood?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Actually, it's made out of clay, yeah.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: So I'm going to attempt to glue it together, and then I'm going to need something to hold the whole thing together while the glue sets.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Using what materials are within the workshop that you had before, there is a very mild adhesive paste that you construct. Go ahead and make a tinkering roll. This will be with your intelligence modifier.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That was a natural 20.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Very rapidly, with the things that are given at your disposal, not even needing the materials here, but what you have on you as part of your traveling tinkering kit, you piece together a nearly unnoticeable binding agent for clay and dirt and earth-based materials. You manage to fix the ocarina rather quickly, in a period of maybe 20 minutes, and with the help of Keyleth's Druidcraft, dry it and manage to get it fixed.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Your instrument, sir.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Thank you. That's one good deed you've done me today. I appreciate that."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Don't forget about all them ales, yeah?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (whistles) It's awful. He doesn't really know how to play, and it's like (off-key singing).

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's quite nice.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: At least you can always draw.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "If I can find my quill."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm sorry. I said I'm sorry. I looked for 20 fucking minutes. I looked, all right?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I'm sure we could find you a quill.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I've got one right fucking here. I pull the black feather out from behind my ear and hold it up. This is a very fine feather to sweeten the deal. Don't fuck us over. And I slide it into the book.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Don't give him that, Vax. It's too nice!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, it is really nice! I know you're acting like he's lying, but he's telling the fucking truth.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Good lie, Grog.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We've really been burned. I am really going to punch you in the back of the head if you fuck us over. Do you understand me? I don't like you.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I like you! Well. Are we at an agreement?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Sure, why not. Me?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Who's he shaking?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Whoever your leader is! Shake my hand."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Here, give me your fucking hand, you dirty bastard.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Before you got your hand there, Vax, Vex put her hand in, and both of you guys clasp both sides of his hand at the same time. A trio handshake.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm pretty sure he was talking to me.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm pretty sure he was talking to me, actually.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Things you wish to avoid. One, the Hut of Wodenna. She's a terrible woman. You see a hut, don't go. You may smell enticing things."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Odenna?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Two words at once. I'm drunk. But do not go near the hut. Avoid the hut. No hut! "Two. Avoid the Last Campsite of Sorudun the Happy."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Sounds nice.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, that sounds fun.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Avoid it. Trust me, avoid it. If there's a campsite that's empty, looks happy? Avoid it. And "three, avoid the theater."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I love the theater!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Oh, that's good advice, actually.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Avoid the theater."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Just in general, the theater?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "In general. I hate all theater. Let's avoid the theater, please!"

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I do an insight check.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Do it.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I don't know what I have. Terrible. 13.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He seems pretty perturbed by the idea of theater.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm changing my mind on this guy.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Why should we avoid the hut? What does Wodenna do?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "She's been around a while."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: She's a hag? Is she a hag?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "That's a name. Best to avoid. Trust me."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We do nothing but trust you.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Great. Wondrous. And who are you, by the way?"

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We're Vox Machina.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: The Slayer's Take.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Pleasure to meet you all, Vox Machina Slayer's "Take." He holds his drink out for you to fill again.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: How many fingers am I holding up?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I don't care. Thank you. Now, the deal is made, drink's been had, introductions have been "properly given. I think it's time for bed." He takes two steps forward, (thud) face-first in the center of the main area, and starts snoring loudly.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Maybe we should move him to a safe location that we can lock.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: With those 20 guards, right, Scanlan?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Can I take his ocarina? Just for the night?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a sleight of hand check.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: He's asleep, so do I get advantage or something?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a sleight of hand check.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Natural 20.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You sneak forward, and in a move that would've made Vax proud, you pull the ocarina from his grasp, show it to the rest of the party, and tuck it away.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: And Vex!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That was primo, baby.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Thanks.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Hey, Keyleth.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You've got magic. I don't entirely trust this thing. We were told specifically not to trust anything. Do you have any spell that can do true-seeing, or that can restore him if he's putting on this form, or that can dispel some charm that he has around him or some aura?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Maybe some sort of magical thing that he put on me, because I'm pretty sure he cast something on me and my brother.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Really? What happened? What did you feel?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: A shiver. When we shook his hand.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay. Yeah.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: He never told us what he wanted you to get, what he wanted to steal.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: No, he hasn't.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Pikey, do you have something that can reveal some truth or dispel magic from him?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I actually have Dispel Magic right now.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can we try it? On me and my brother, see if it cancels out whatever he just did?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'll touch Vex and cast Dispel Magic and see if anything happens. Wait, take off all magical items first.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Everything I'm wearing is magic.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Well, take it off.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, take it off!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What is it about this dimension that makes us get naked all the time?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: The hat is not magic. You can leave that on.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Thank you. So I take off everything except for the hat.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I don't want to risk dispelling anything.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm taking a short walk, all right.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Every time I've seen anything attractive and naked, it's gone very poorly today. I'm walking away.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It's like wearing metal in a really hot sauna. You just don't do it. Come on.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Roll a d20 and add your wisdom modifier.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: All right. I'll do the big guy. Come on, big guy. Oh, that's okay. My wisdom, just my modifier? 22.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. You cast the spell.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Do you feel different?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That was a very high wisdom roll. Do you feel anything?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Do I feel anything?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You didn't feel anything in particular.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Give it a minute. It might take a while to take effect. Maybe do some jumping jacks.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm definitely putting my clothes back on.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I can also try a Regeneration spell.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Wait. I think I can do something. I can sing a song. That's mostly what I do, if you haven't noticed by now. I have a power that I never ever use. It's called Countercharm. I can counter charms.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to start gathering the servants to pick the boy up and put him in his room.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And the 20 guards lift his form and carry him off.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Don't let him steal any of our shit.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Everything would disappear, anyway.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: No, I mean our personal shit.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Lock the door.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, but what if he can do Scanlan's thing where he goes through the door?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I have a feeling if he shook your hand and did something, like Scanlan said, it's probably a Pike thing, like a Remove Curse. It's got to be something more like that. Mine is all nature-based. I can try to Regenerate you, but I don't think this would fall under that.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: She's fine. It was a draft. She needs to wear more clothes. It's all right.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Do you feel different?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, not anymore.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I have a feeling it's like if you stray from a contract or something, you might feel it. I don't know. That's what I would think.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'll go to bed. And I sleep on all of my weapons and stuff. They're under me, on top of the mattress.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Perfect. Everyone else go to bed?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I put a blanket over the satyr, and I pet him, now that he's asleep. Is his fur coarse, or is it soft?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's pretty coarse.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That is really creepy.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Creepy, unconsented petting farm.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay, good night.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I make sure everything's fine. I will leave him his book, lock the door, and head up to my room and lock the door behind me, as well.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I stayed up all night reading.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Are you going to take a point of exhaustion for that?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I have to.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I get very little sleep. I'm having trouble sleeping.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You are?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. So this is your second level of exhaustion.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No, I slept last time.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Oh, that's right! You did sleep. Correct. So you do take another point of exhaustion now, so you're back to one point of exhaustion. So all your ability checks are at disadvantage.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: How long does that take?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: A week.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: It takes a week? To memorize it?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I think it was 48 hours of reading over a period of six days.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh jeez.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: How close?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm on day four, I believe. And I'm up to 36 hours now, if this counts as ten, 12 hours.

lines.name: ASHLEY, LAURA
lines.text: Wow.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: So you're close. Yeah, you're doing good.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. Anyone else doing anything?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I sleep, and I dream of fireflies and the Feywild because it's so magical.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There you go.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I'm going to get up early, but yeah.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm going to get up early and try to fix my hair and make it as pristine as I can and try to clean off my clothes and everything before we go.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I sleep like a baby in my armor.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. Percy, as you're getting ready to go to bed, you feel this strange tickle at the back of your head that dissipates.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Is it what I think it is?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It is the fading of a Charm Person spell.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Okay. Goddamn it.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Son of a fuck.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: And as I'm going to bed? Or as I wake up?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you're going to bed.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Okay. Fuck.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Did you fuck us?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Percy was charmed.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: No, you don't know anything yet. I'm not quite going to go to sleep yet. I'm going to go see who else is still awake.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Scanlan is reading in his room with the door slightly ajar.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yes?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: The little fucker charmed me.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Anyway. What do you think we should do?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I don't know what we can do.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Wait. When were you charmed? What did it affect? What decisions did you make today that were

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We made a bloody deal with him.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Well, we can always back out on the deal.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Well, no, we can't, really.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What, is there some sort of blood pact that we made?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: (sputtering) I don't know exactly how it works. It's just in any book you read about the Feywild, you make a deal and it's a deal and you have to deal with it.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What does mean? You and I could go down to his room right now and kill him and be done with it.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I don't think that would work.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Would we be cursed?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Maybe?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Haunted forever?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Probably.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh man. That sucks. I don't want to be haunted. That's for you and Vax! (laughter)

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You would look lovely in eyeliner.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No baggage, man, no baggage. What do we do? We made a deal with a devil of some sort.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It was inevitable.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Is there a way to trick the trickster into releasing us from the deal?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Could be.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Because, you know, I'm a sly talker.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: When did this show turn into Rosencrantz and Guildenstern Are Dead? (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Right now.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Right now. I'm going to have to tell the others in the morning. I'm going to go see if anybody else is awake. Oh god. Sleep well. Oh, you're reading. Never mind. Don't sleep.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Now I've got to read about the fucking fey, too.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: No. Finish your bloody book.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Keyleth is at rest, Grog is at rest, Vax is at rest. Vex is still up, cleaning your garments, you said, right? And Pike, you went to bed but are waking up early, correct? So essentially, it's just Vex who's awake.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Vex.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yes?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Little shit put a charm on me. I felt it wear off about 45 minutes ago.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Before we made the deal with him?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Fuck, Percy! I made the deal because you said it was fine!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Well, I--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's fine. You didn't know. Well.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Well, at least we know that he definitely can't be trusted.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's our own stupid fault. We knew we weren't supposed to trust anything here.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I know. We've got to make sure that Pike doesn't give him back his whistle, just yet.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Why did you want to fix his whistle? You just liked him.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: He was so nice! He was just so nice.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Damn it. I thought you knew something we didn't know. I really thought you did.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I did. It's sadly what I knew was he's a little shit. I just didn't know until about half an hour ago. I hate magic!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Percy. Change of subject. Would you say I look put together? Well off? With this armor.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: In what sense?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Well, you come from money, right?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Right, so do I look like I come from money?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Does she look like she comes from money?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's whatever Percival thinks she would be in his eyes.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (quietly) She's naked in a hat.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: (laughs) Honestly, dear, you're too happy to look like you come from money.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (laughs) I don't believe that.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: No, it's a sure sign of it, is an abject misery, believe me. I can speak to it. You look too much like you, and you don't look enough like something you're supposed to be. If you feel the urge to deeply bullshit, I'd be happy to help you. It's not hard.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: No. It is easy to pretend you come from money. You just have to be a bit of a shit and wear what everybody else is wearing. Does this have something to do with that city? It does, doesn't it. Who's there?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Well, you know. Everyone. We were judged, growing up, and I don't look forward to seeing that again.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: (sighs) Well.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's not important.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh, I disagree. Dear, I think that if you're worried about them knowing whether or not you've made your money and made your fortune-- I don't think that's going to be the thing to earn their respect. I think you're better off, A, with the company that you keep, and B, with the fact that you're probably just better than most of them.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (laughs)

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I've known a lot of people with money, and they are definitely not worth you. And besides, if they have something nice that makes you feel inferior, we can just take it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (laughs) I like the way you think.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Well, and then they're just shit without anything, and then you're you with their stuff.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Thank you, Percy.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You're welcome. I know it doesn't really help.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Will you stay at my side when we're there?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yes. And the outfit works. Don't change it. Keep the hat.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (laughs) All right. Good night.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Good night. Sleep well.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We'll sort out this charmed mess in the morning.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm sorry for my part in it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So you guys go your separate ways. You find yourself eventually to bed as the rest of the group is asleep. Vex, you take a bit of solace in the conversation, finish cleaning your things, though it doesn't seem like the incessant scrubbing you were driven on has much purpose, nor the impact you thought it might at this point, and you resign yourself to sleep for the evening. As the evening comes to a close, Pike, you wake up early. As you come out of your room, you struggle with the view of 20 guards slowly shifting through the foyer as a very hungover and groaning satyr begins clomping through the main foyer, going, "Breakfast, please? Please, breakfast?"

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Yes. Follow me to the kitchen.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Yes! Someone they listen to! Thank you!" Rubbing his eyes as he follows you into the kitchen. He comes up onto one of the long benches in the center of one of the main dining tables.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I put down a cup of coffee for him, and I run into the kitchen and get a very large-- oh no.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Are you poisoning me?!"

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: What's wrong?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "What is this?"

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: It's coffee?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I don't like coffee."

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Oh. What do you want?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Something that's not coffee."

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Okay. Can we get him something that's not coffee?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The servants look at each other, confused, and wander off and come back with a carafe of an apple juice.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Apple juice will be great.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "That is familiar. Thank you." He takes the carafe.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I run in the kitchen really quick and get a very large piece of butcher paper.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Okay. So. Garmelie.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Yes."

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I think you're so talented, and I wanted to ask if maybe you could draw a family portrait for us. The most ridiculous you can make it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "What do you mean?"

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Just of all of us. I want to hang it above the mantel before everybody wakes up.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Well, it's hard to do without seeing the subjects, but if you want to fill in the details?"

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Yeah, fill in the details.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "All right. Well, I need a quill or some charcoal."

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Vax gave you a quill last night.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "He gave me a feather. It has to be refined into a quill."

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Oh, I forgot. I think there's one in the kitchen.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There is no quill in the kitchen, but glancing around and asking the servants, there are pieces of charcoal. There is charcoal available, sketch charcoal.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Okay. Can you use charcoal?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Of course."

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Great.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "All right."

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Have at it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "You first?"

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Sure.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "All right."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It's Leonardo and Winslet.

lines.name: ASHLEY, MARISHA
lines.text: Draw me like one of your French girls!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You hear the gentle lyrical stylings of Celine Dion swell in background as the satyr quickly begins sketching your charcoal form.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: And remember, very ridiculous.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Next to that is a perfectly defined, unchanged portrait of Scanlan Shorthalt.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I just wanted to hear you explain it. So I'm going to take it and I'm going to paste it above the mantel. I'm going to go back upstairs to my room.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Eventually you all come to consciousness, brought to the wonderful, welcome morning scent of, once again, a chickenful breakfast. You find yourselves down to a once again passed-out satyr, slumped over the breakfast table with two plates of mostly devoured chicken, mashed potatoes, and a couple other side elements.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That sounds so good.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There above, on the mantel across the room, is a glorious sketch of the family of Vox Machina.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Charming.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Who changed my-- oh, I look pretty good.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: This is brilliant. Wait, Scanlan, why do you look normal?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I think we all look normal, actually. That's how I see us, sure.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: This picture is disgusting.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I love it.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: No, that is awful.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You guys, we have a souvenir! We have a souvenir from the Feywild!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I think he wants a beating. That's what he wants.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I flick his head.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Yes, what? What? Hi!"

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Why would you do that when we've been so hospitable?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "It's a gift." Make a persuasion check.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He goes, "I thought I'd leave you a little present."

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I love it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Well, it's gross, but everybody else looks quite wonderful.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I sit down, right in front and across the table.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I guess I don't mind. At least I'm big.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I like it.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I think it's gross.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Eat up, and we'll be on our way!" He notices the tension from Percy and Grog.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: No, not yet. Not yet. Just so all cards are on the table, we know that we agreed to a deal last night, despite your charm spell on me, which was--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Defending myself! As was warranted."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Fair play.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You got charmed?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I do think we should inform you, though, we may have used a little magic on you. Sorry. Just to make sure the deal was solid.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I'm certain that was a necessary precaution."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Well, the deal stands as it is at the moment, I suppose.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Wondrous. I had hoped as such, because we have much to gain."

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Wait.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah, no, he charmed me. He put a charm on me last night.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I had a feeling.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: So you no longer think it's a good idea to enter into this agreement?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Well, a little late.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "It is a little late."

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: You never told us what you wanted.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I'm going to show you."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You're going to walk us right in.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Something like that."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Well, might as well.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What are you going to do?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Why don't you pet his legs again, weirdo?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You fascinate me.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Good. That's not the first time I've heard that."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Friend, I applaud your cleverness. I am excited by this deal, and I want to let you know that, god forbid something comes up, where I come from, the world I come from, I am possibly the worst person you have ever met. And I think, I hope, not necessarily to hurt you or harm you, but I hope that one day you can know just how awful I can be.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make an intimidation check.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (stuttering) "I hope it never comes to that."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Let's hope.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I can make addendums to the art piece, if you're unhappy."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I love the art piece. Actually, since we're on the subject, have you ever drawn yourself before?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Many times."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'd be curious to see one of your self portraits. Are they in the book?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "No."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I didn't think so. Self-reflection is not one of my favorite pastimes, either. Anyway, what are you looking for in the city?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I'll show you. As part of the agreement, it'll be unveiled upon arrival."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Sounds good to me.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's not sneaky at all. I fully trust you.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Much to see. Much to take."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I hate him now.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (off-key music)

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: No. We did that for you. Do not abuse this. That's right.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: What are you doing with your hands?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Where did-- What?"

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Where did what?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "They giveth, and they take away."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Bless the small print.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I'll just sit here, then." And sits on the floor, waiting for you guys to finish.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What sort of magic did you cast on us?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "What do you mean?"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What was the deal we agreed to? What will happen if it breaks?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Deals are meant to be kept. Should you go against a deal that you've made, especially in "here, these realms, there are consequences, so don't stray from the deal."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I think it's just a deal. I think deals may be a big deal here.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: So we can still kill him?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I don't know. I think if it comes to it, it's a possibility.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What happened to don't hurt or touch anything in the Feywild?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, we fucked that up, didn't we?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Can I take out his ocarina and play a couple of notes while I'm looking at him?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Sure. Make a performance check.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Performance check?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's a thing.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Is this your first performance check?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You're definitely the right person to be doing this.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Yeah, right. 13.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 13. In a very rudimentary, kindergarten recorder way: (off-key music) It's a little shaky, but you get the hang of it. It's the only sound in the room. It's dead quiet as you do this in the middle of breakfast, with food being brought to the table.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That was amazing, Pike.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Move over, Scanlan. Holy hell, that was good.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Thanks. I learned once.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I don't think I've ever seen anyone play an instrument that well.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Wait, hey. This is my house.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Oh, look, the satyr's sad. What's the matter, friend?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "She has my ocarina."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, that's terrible. Poor guy.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You're clever. I'm sure you'll be fine.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Not just yet.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Eat your breakfast."

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Already did.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Somebody get this poor asshole a handkerchief. He looks so sad.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He sits there and pouts. As you guys finish your meal, laughing and enjoying yourselves.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: As he pouts, I Druidcraft a little flower crown for him.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He somehow recedes even further into his grumpy self, his neck disappearing as his head pulls into his torso.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: He's so fun to mess with.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We are really shit at making friends.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: So I'm curious. While we're eating, would you happen to tell us what our first objective might be?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: He's going to show us.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I think it's time to make our way in.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, I'm full.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Scanlan!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I'm going to give this to you.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: The Macarena?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Yeah. Because I don't like performing.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You're really good at it.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: That's a lie. Just take this and maybe you can charm some people with it. I don't know if that's what it is, but I don't want him to have it.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Thank you. I will try my best.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: All right. Let's go.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Can't believe I wasted a natural 20 on his-- Sorry. I'm good.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You guys finish your breakfast. The guards come with you and escort you and your ally outside the door. As you exit, the--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Wait. Take and roll up the painting, the charcoal drawing that he did and put it in the Bag of Holding.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's going to disappear as soon as we take it out! Leave it in the mansion. That way it'll stay.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's from the mansion, so it'll stay in the mansion.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Will it stay in the mansion?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You've tried taking things out of the mansion, and they've turned to dust.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: But I know things will also get ejected from the mansion. Okay, I'll leave it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There is a rather heavy cloud that has come over, and it's not a terrible downpour, but a gentle rainfall has been here for a while, and the floor between the grasses is quite slushy as you step out. (squelch)

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Let's go to the city.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Vex? Should we be dressing for the occasion? Should we put on our nice cloaks?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We do have nice cloaks we could wear.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I think we're going to be sneaking in to steal things.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, there's no way we could sneak in.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We're going to go in and make introductions and get settled and then figure out what the fuck we're doing.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, cloak me.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: With what?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Our nice cloaks.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: He has some fancy cloaks, unless he's used them all.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Am I still made of wood, by the way?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, that faded with the night's rest.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I don't have fancy robes. I do have your fancy winter stuff.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's rain, I would assume? It's not chilly, but cold.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'll cloak up. Try and look like I made some sort of effort.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: All right, Keyleth gets a cloak. Do you want some nice shit?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh, yes.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm not changing anything.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: How long will it take to get to the city from where we are?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: A few hours, maybe.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can't you craft something to keep the rain off of us?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'll do a little cantrip Gust over top of us to make one of those air umbrellas that would never work in real life.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You travel for another hour or so before the grass towards the outskirts of the mountain range in the city begins to slowly subside. It grows thinner and shorter, and you come to a bit of marshland, almost. Treeless, open marshland with little bushes in clusters. Anything you guys want to--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Perception check? See if I can see anything moving ahead of us?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, perception check.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You do notice that, occasionally, upon this walk, you see, different from the rest of the bushes and pieces of terrain, these deep bluish purple sprout leaves, almost like carrot tops, very leafy plant top emerges in places, occasionally clusters of two or three. There aren't a lot of them, but many of them occur throughout the walk in this swampy landscape.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Garmelie? What are these?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Don't do anything with them."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Mandrakes? Oh, cool.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Let's leave it.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I've read things about those.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What's this?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's just a thing. Just read it.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It's a potted screaming baby. Leave them.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a perception check, guys.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Everybody or just the twins?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Everybody who's paying attention.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm not. I'm reading.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: This is not woods anymore? This is not forest? Is this marsh?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Just past marsh into flatland. 20?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You get about a hundred feet from the wall before you, Vex, hear (scrape) a quick sound. You leap back instinctually as all of you watch a series of bolts and arrows (arrow impacts) across the floor right in front of you.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That's exciting.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You all stop in place.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Should we attack?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I look up on the wall. Is it coming from archers on the wall?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can now see, up on the wall, dozens of figures atop, with longbows, and some with crossbows, drawn and nocked, trained on all of you.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I take my hood down. You know us. We're here to see my father.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There's a pause, and they're still 100 feet away from you. One of the voices says, "Who is

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: The twins. Vex'ahlia and Vax'ildan.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Syldor's children.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They're trained on any movement you guys give at this moment. As time passes, an individual steps up to the top of the wall, adorned in similar Syngorian armor, but the helmet is taken off, and you see a woman with deep crimson hair braided to one side and shaved on the other. She steps up and looks out. "Vex'ahlia. Vax'ildan."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Do we know who she is?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "The Vessar twins return. Do I know why? What is your business here in Syngorn?"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We came to speak to our father.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "And the rest of your company?"

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: They're with us.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a persuasion check, both of you.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: 14. I'll stop using that one tonight.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The woman turns and steps off the wall again. You can see the very front gate, the front of the wall, opens ever so slightly, about a five-foot gap left.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Everybody, let my sister and I do the talking for a minute. Thank you. I scoop up my sister's hand, down by my side, and walk forward.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you guys walk single file, continuing towards the city, your satyr friend stays in the very back behind you, clutching. (whimpering) As you glance back, Grog, he's not there.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can you still feel him? Oh, sorry.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Can I reach down to where he was?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Still tugging, he's holding on to you, but has lost visibility.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Clever little spider monkey.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Now Watcher Iova, the Watchers which guard the wall. She appears to be of an elevated status within the Watchers of Syngorn. As you approach, she lowers her head in a respectful bow, but still not breaking eye contact, and has an aloof and distanced expression.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Watcher Iova. Nice to see you have elevated yourself.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Time has passed since you were finding your own path. Surprised to see you return here, "especially so far from the material realms."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Then you can imagine there is great cause for us to be here.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Is your father aware of your arrival?"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "He is now. You and your guests will be watched. You will be followed, until otherwise "given proof and permission from individuals higher than my station within the city, preferably your father."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I would expect nothing less.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Now, go. And welcome to Syngorn." She turns around, puts her helmet on, and half the guard walk away, while another six remain behind, keeping watch.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Interesting.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Not quite a warm welcome.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I wouldn't expect one.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I guess we should probably make our way straight to-- so we can have free rein.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I motion for the rest to come up behind.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The center of the ageless place is divided by a grand lake of pure blue water, a roiling mist drifting across the surface, obscuring the view of boats currently on the surface of the water. You do notice a large military presence within the city, as the armored guard of Syngorn, these individuals, the armored military force known as the Verdant Guard, are walking throughout the city. Not with a hurried pace, but there is a general tension in the air, far more than you've ever seen in all the years that you did spend in your youth within Syngorn. That's where we'll finish our session for the evening.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Shit.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I felt like we were just getting started.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's 10:30, though.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: How?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I guess you just have to fly in next week, too!

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I wish I could.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As I look down and once again notice my Tick Spoons shirt I've had on the entire evening, my overshirt seems to have been shortening it to--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Poon!

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Oh, I noticed.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Or even better--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Poo!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Well, that's okay. It says Spoon.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Spoon! It's intended to be. It all works fine. Both ways it's the new Scanlan shirt. Poon and poo! Scanlan Shorthalt. Autobiography. Well, great, guys! Thank you so much. We'll be picking up the next length of this journey in the reunion of Vex and Vax with their father, Syldor Vessar.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Syldor. Such a dipshit.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh shit. At the live show.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Live show, no pressure.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I am so excited.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And you did notice that they were referred to as the Vessar twins.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Vessar twins?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What does that even mean?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's our dad's stupid last name.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Vessar? Vax and Vex Vessar?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Whether they use the name, that's up to them, and I don't think that they do. But that it is. All right, folks, we'll see you guys, some of you, live at the-- well, we'll see you all live next week, but some of you we'll see at the actual venue in person.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Thank you to Loot Crate.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You guys are awesome.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: One day left for Joe Mad.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (Dragon Ball Z war cry) There we go.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's okay. Ashley, I'm glad you could join us.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yay Ashley!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And we'll see you guys next week. Is it Thursday yet?
